title: How do you get into Bronze V?
body:
Alright, lets be serious here for like 4.9 sec.

How in the hell do you make it into B5?

I have seen people loose all 10 of their promos and end up in B3 or B4

I understand Afk's and Feeding and all that good stuff.

But getting into B5 is harder then getting into fort nox.

WAIT NO BETTER QUESTION

HOW ARE YOU IN B5 AND HAVE 300+ GAMES IN RANKED
LIKE HOW.

I HAVE SEEN PEOPLE ASK TO BUY B5 ACCOUNTS BECAUSE ITS SO HARD TO GET INTO IT.

Thats all...
